pageContent: Introduction: Focal therapy (FT) ablates areas of prostate cancer rather than treating the whole gland. We compared oncological outcomes of FT to radical prostatectomy (RP).

metaData.source:
Management of erectile dysfunction and LUTS/incontinence: the two most common, long-term side effects of prostate cancer treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32101696/
